arts.ttl: ‘All that gruelling hard work to come back from injury was worth it’ - Charlton striker Miles Leaburn on hitting the goal trail
arts.sum: Miles Leaburn says that scoring goals for Charlton Athletic has been payback for the hard graft required to return from a serious hamstring injury. “It’s been tough, getting my fitness back,” said Leaburn.

arts.ttl: Charlton Athletic boss assesses next League One challenge as high-flying Wycombe set for Valley
arts.sum: Charlton Athletic manager Nathan Jones has talked about the test facing his side as they look to make it a hat-trick of League One victories by defeating Wycombe Wanderers at The Valley on Sunday. Even though they have changed manager they have gone with the captain there, Blooms, and he has done a fantastic job.

arts.ttl: Charlton beat Cambridge to record back-to-back wins
arts.sum: Tyreece Campbell and Miles Leaburn were on target.
